metadata.description: Synthesizing 5 experiments into paper-ready claims with statistical rigor

SC1.criterion: Spearman rho > 0.3 for CRND noise detection

positive_claim_1.evidence: Schoener's D profiles differ substantially across feature spaces for most datasets

positive_claim_3.claim: Ecological metrics provide unique ordering information

negative_claim_1.claim: CRND does not detect label noise

negative_claim_2.claim: Method selection signal is weak to absent

table4_success_criteria.description: Spearman rho > 0.3 for CRND noise detection

table5_limitations.mitigation: Reframe contribution around class characterization, not noise detection

table5_limitations.limitation: Method selection signal is weak overall
table5_limitations.mitigation: Report mental_health_conditions exception; focus on ecological metric novelty

table5_limitations.limitation: Simulated LLM features (text-response one-hot) may not capture true LLM representations
table5_limitations.evidence: Logprobs unavailable from OpenRouter; one-hot encoding is a coarse proxy
table5_limitations.mitigation: Acknowledge in limitations; suggest future work with logprob-capable models

table5_limitations.limitation: Small dataset (clinical_patient_triage_nl) may produce unstable estimates
table5_limitations.evidence: Only 31 examples; wide confidence intervals on all metrics
table5_limitations.mitigation: Report separately; exclude from pooled estimates where appropriate

table5_limitations.limitation: PCA dimensionality reduction loses information for high-dim spaces
table5_limitations.evidence: TF-IDF 2D captures <2% variance for most datasets
table5_limitations.mitigation: PCA stability analysis shows class ordering often preserved despite low variance

experiments_evaluated: exp_id2_it2 (Method selection with char n-gram proxy)
exp_id2_it3 (Method selection with true LLM features)
